concept.title: Couchbase SDKs
concept.shortdesc: Couchbase SDKs allow for programmatic access to Couchbase from your favorite programming languages.

conbody.p: Couchbase SDKs have the most capable APIs available for accessing data. They provide a consistent and idiomatic experience for your language.
SDKs are available for the following languages. Click on your language for instructions on setting up a development environment.

Couchbase SDKs attempt to follow common verbs and semantics (as much as the individual language allows). Examples of using SDKs will be demonstrated in Python, but can easily be mimicked in other languages.
